mhs.src.storage

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • mhs.src.storage.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database Database interfaces persistent the data storage mechanism, on local disk and remote (Google Calendar Service). - Handles task queries and CRUD operations - Handles user configuration setting operations
    Author:
    Timothy Lim Yi Wen A0087048X
